contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 11, 2011 D Hardraw Scar (Class A)
Hardraw Scar (Class A) 10 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar-class-a
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Best Solo - Harrogate Best March - Elland Youth Best Hymn - Harrogate Best original piece composed within the last 40 years - Wetherby Most Entertaining - Hade Edge (shared with Ratby Mid in Section B)
Jan. 5, 2011, 1:17 p.m. March 16, 2012, 12:48 p.m.
1 Harrogate Band Craig Ratcliffe
2 Elland Youth Band Samantha Harrison
3 Hade Edge Simon Wood
4 Wetherby and District Silver Alan Seymour
5 Otley Brass Band Gordon Eddison
